Project Acknowledgements

Project Acknowledgements#

The project has been possible due to the resources provided by the following sources:

  • CodeWithHarry Youtube Channel who taught me python

  • GeeksForGeeks which solved a lot of my issues

  • The Python Documentation which also assisted me a lot

  • https://www.w3schools.com/ which too provied essential resources for making several functions

  • Stackoverflow which if I ignore, God will send me to hell

There are many more websites that I used for taking minor references whose names I cannot recall. I would love to thank you all express my heartful gratitude. :)
